akn:section.akn:heading: Jurisdiction of States in acquired land

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 320104. Jurisdiction of States in acquired land Nothing in this chapter shall be held to deprive any State, or political subdivision of a State, of its civil and criminal jurisdiction in and over land acquired by the United States under this chapter. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3259.)
